data.eml:eml: Siccia imana, a new species from Rwanda (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V. (2019): Siccia imana, a new species from Rwanda (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4571 (2): 285-289, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.2.11
